#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<string>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define maxn 1010
 
struct Player{
	string name;
	int point;
	int time;
	bool operator < (const Player p) const{
		if(point == p.point) 
			return time > p.time;
		else
			return point < p.point;
			
	}
}p[maxn];
 
int main() {
	int N;
	while(scanf("%d", &N) == 1) {
		map<string,int> s;
		string a;
		int num, cnt = 1;
		for(int i = 1; i <= N; i++) {
			cin >> a >>  num;
			if(!s[a]) {
				s[a] = cnt++;
				p[s[a]].name = a;
				p[s[a]].point = num;	
				p[s[a]].time = i;
			}
			else {
				p[s[a]].point += num;
				p[s[a]].time = i;
			}
		}
		sort(p + 1, p + 1 + cnt);
			cout << p[cnt].name << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
